segments.text: I see two children involved in a secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is precariously balanced on a stool by the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching up, way up, to reach an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside the cabinet, clearly labeled, is the "COOKIE JAR".
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already diving in, no doubt grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He even has a plate to collect his loot, that's clever!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister stands beside him, looking on eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is raised, palm open, obviously waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are working together, a perfect little team of mischief-makers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat, right under the nose of the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious to their delicious scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anticipation on the girl's face is really charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This clandestine cookie raid is quite entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
